actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study for the establishment of certain bicycle trails.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretaries of the Interior, Transportation, and Agriculture to conduct a feasibility study for the establishment of bicycle trails along specified United States highways under the National Trails System Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study for the establishment of certain bicycle trails.
